objective: Infiltrate the secure corporate tower to plant a micro-bug on the reclusive Director's encrypted communication device.

locations.name: The Serpent's Mouth Alley
locations.description: Foul-smelling refuse bins and overflowing recycling dumpsters line this dimly lit alley, a common shortcut for deliveries and illicit activities.
locations.visual: Grimy brick alley, overflowing dumpsters, flickering fluorescent light, rain-slicked pavement.

locations.name: The Rattlesnake's Den
locations.description: A maze of condensation-dripping pipes and humming conduits, leading to the building's skeletal underbelly, rarely traversed by human foot.
locations.visual: Dark, narrow utility tunnels, thick pipes overhead, flickering emergency lights, damp concrete.

locations.name: The Buzzard's Perch
locations.description: Steel doors scarred with countless impacts open into a stark, utilitarian waiting area, often empty but occasionally used by maintenance crews.
locations.visual: Large industrial freight elevator, scuffed concrete floor, overhead fluorescent lights, security camera in corner.

locations.name: The Raven's Roost Lounge
locations.description: Plush leather sofas and expensive art adorn this panoramic lounge, where high-level executives unwind, oblivious to the watchful eyes and subtle machinations.
locations.visual: Opulent executive lounge, floor-to-ceiling windows with city view, modern art, well-dressed people sipping drinks.

locations.name: The Spider's Thread Corridor
locations.description: Pristine white walls and hushed silence define this sterile corridor, punctuated by card-reader panels and security cameras guarding sensitive data servers.
locations.visual: Long, brightly lit, minimalist corridor, frosted glass doors, embedded wall screens, discreet cameras.

locations.name: The Vulture's Lockbox
locations.description: A reinforced antechamber designed to bottleneck intruders, featuring multiple layers of biometric scanners and an oppressive pressure-plate floor.
locations.visual: Small, circular room, glowing biometric scanners, heavy blast door, pressure plate floor, sterile white walls.

items.name: Discarded Maintenance Tool Kit
items.description: A forgotten kit of basic tools, possibly useful for prying or cutting.
items.visual: A grubby, plastic toolbox, slightly ajar, revealing a rusty wrench, a pair of bent pliers, and a roll of electrical tape, sitting against a graffiti-covered brick wall in a dark alley.

items.name: Alley Cat's Lockpick Set
items.description: A professional set of lockpicks, small enough to be concealed, perfect for intricate locks.
items.visual: A compact, black leather case, barely visible under a loose paving stone in the alley, containing an array of polished, slender metal picks and tension wrenches.

items.name: The Shadow's Veil Hood
items.description: A lightweight, dark fabric hood designed for anonymity and quick concealment.
items.visual: A folded, dark grey, almost black, lightweight fabric hood, tucked snugly behind a rusted dumpster, blending into the shadows.

items.name: Unsecured Network Drive
items.description: A generic external hard drive, left haphazardly near a server rack, likely containing system backups.
items.visual: A standard, black external hard drive, its indicator light faintly blinking, resting precariously on a stack of manuals next to a humming server rack in a cold, blue-lit room.

items.name: Security Guard's Coffee Mug
items.description: A mundane mug, but its placement might reveal a guard's blind spot or routine.
items.visual: A ceramic coffee mug, half-empty, with a generic corporate logo, sitting on a cluttered desk in front of a bank of security monitors, some displaying static.

items.name: Master Keycard Duplicator
items.description: A small, illicit device capable of cloning RFID keycards for unauthorized access.
items.visual: A sleek, credit-card sized black device with a single LED, hidden beneath a stack of old security reports in a locked drawer in the security office.

items.name: Silent Eye Bug
items.description: A miniature, high-fidelity audio bug designed for covert surveillance, barely detectable.
items.visual: A minuscule, almost invisible black disc, no larger than a button, with a tiny antenna, magnetically attached to the underside of a security console's desk.

items.name: Executive's Forgotten Tablet
items.description: A high-end tablet, left unattended, potentially logged into sensitive corporate networks.
items.visual: A sleek, silver tablet with a cracked screen protector, resting on a plush, empty armchair in a dimly lit, luxurious executive lounge, a half-finished drink beside it.

items.name: Confidential Client Roster
items.description: A discreet binder containing a list of high-value clients and their contact details.
items.visual: A slim, leather-bound folder with embossed initials, lying casually on a polished mahogany coffee table amidst scattered business magazines.

items.name: Janitor's Master Key-ring
items.description: A bulky ring of keys, granting access to various utility closets and maintenance panels.
items.visual: A heavy metal key-ring with a dozen different keys, some worn smooth, dangling from a hook on a cleaning cart parked in a long, sterile office corridor.

items.name: Visitor Logbook
items.description: A binder detailing all recent visitors, their times, and who they met with.
items.visual: A thick, open logbook with columns for names and times, resting on the polished counter of a modern reception desk, next to a vase of artificial flowers.

items.name: The CEO's Personal Comm-Link
items.description: A bespoke, encrypted communication device, likely containing sensitive executive directives.
items.visual: A sleek, metallic smartphone, slightly thicker than a standard model, with a glowing green power button, hidden within a false bottom of a decorative antique globe on the CEO's imposing desk.

items.name: Server Rack Access Key
items.description: A standard key for opening the protective cages around critical server racks.
items.visual: A simple, silver-colored key with a plastic grip, hanging conspicuously from a small hook near a labeled server rack, glinting under the harsh fluorescent lights.

items.name: Network Operations Manual
items.description: A comprehensive guide detailing the network's architecture, security protocols, and vulnerabilities.
items.visual: A thick, well-worn technical manual with a faded cover, its pages dog-eared, sitting on a stool next to a blinking, whirring bank of network equipment.

items.name: The 'Heart' Mainframe Console
items.description: The primary interface for the company's central processing unit, crucial for planting the bug.
items.visual: A large, imposing server console with multiple glowing screens displaying complex code and network activity, surrounded by a maze of cables and indicator lights, humming with power.
